name: MangaFox - Clean Black with Search
description:
This is basically style 18702 by user 10596, but with the search header enabled on the main page.  Darkens/blackens up the site a bit: makes it easier on the eyes.  Also removes ads and social media junk.

Full size main page: 
http://sadpanda.us/images/204816-NMNAULS.png

Full size reading page:
http://sadpanda.us/images/204815-H1HMY2Y.png

I have since started to use the Greasemonkey script Webcomic Reader.  Has numerous features and tweakable settings for a large amount of sites (including MangaFox and other manga sites).  Highly recommended.  I will still continue to update this userstyle though.
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/59842
additional_info:
2011 Sep 21: Finally decided to remove all the text navigation at the bottom of the reading pages. The drop downs are still there, we don't need redundancy.
2011 Aug 12: Added dark color to the new Volume row in chapter lists.
2011 Mar 29: Minor fixes here and there due to small changes in the layout.
2011 Mar 07: Removed invisible ads (blank area was still clickable).
2011 Jan 30: Cleaned up the reading pages.
2010 Aug 31: Removed Flash above the new manga listing.  (The flash slideshow that showcased 3 things, 2 of which are ads.) Fixed screenshots.
2010 Aug 30: Removed RSS and Facebook frames from the sidebar.  Changed the mature warning to red.
